api_list.name: Quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

quotes.author: Stanley Crouch
quotes.quote: Under popular culture's obsession with a naive inclusion, everything is O.K.

quotes.author: Stephen Malkmus
quotes.quote: A good voice isn't so important. It's more important to sound really unique.

quotes.author: Christine Lahti
quotes.quote: I like to take up something that is challenging. I like to stretch myself.

quotes.author: Marc Wallice
quotes.quote: I got nothing. I got my shoes and my pants. I'm staying with a friend. I stop by my mother's every once in a while to get my calls. I don't want to be anywhere anybody can find me.

quotes.author: Abu Bakr
quotes.quote: When knowledge is limited - it leads to folly... When knowledge exceeds a certain limit, it leads to exploitation.
